function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible contagion of diseases due to close contact in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within the built environment","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, ventilation systems, and social distancing measures","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, touchless fixtures, UV-C sanitization","People":"Inhabitants, workers, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Negative impact on health and well-being due to close contact in investment locations","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among investors and stakeholders","Mitigation":"Encourage remote trading, limit in-person meetings, and promote virtual collaboration","Technologies":"Remote trading platforms, virtual meeting software, teleconferencing tools","People":"Investors, stakeholders, traders","Owner":"Investment firms, trading platforms"},{"Description":"Potential for disease transmission through shared spaces and surfaces in investment locations","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission through frequent touchpoints and social interaction","Mitigation":"Regular sanitization of common areas, implementation of touchless technology, and promotion of personal hygiene","Technologies":"Touchless payment systems, antimicrobial surfaces, UV-C disinfection","People":"Investors, employees, maintenance staff","Owner":"Property managers, building administrators"}]}
